name: Greater Iron-Infused Alchemist
resistance: piercing, bludgeoning, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Tough as Nails
traits.desc: The alchemist cannot be critically hit.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The alchemist makes two attacks with its pummeling strike or two with its iron shard attack.

actions.name: Pummeling Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Iron Shard
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) piercing damage.
